security: This document primarily contains salary and employment information for the Select Committee on Assassinations staff during November 1978. There is limited potential for security concerns, as the data is largely administrative. No specific content suggests damage to ongoing operations, international relations, or controversial activities.
summary: This document is a U.S. House of Representatives certification report detailing the salaries and positions of employees for the Select Committee on Assassinations during November 1978.
summary_one_paragraph: This U.S. House of Representatives certification report (ID D01.00.00), dated December 5, 1978, lists the employees of the Select Committee on Assassinations for the accounting period of November 1, 1978, to November 30, 1978. The report includes each employee's name, social security number, position, annual gross pay, salary earned during the period, and any relevant remarks, such as terminations or pay rate changes. G. Robert Blakey is listed as Chief Counsel and Director.
title: Certification Report for Select Committee on Assassinations, November 1978
